name: The Conquered
description:
Five times Leo and Piper remembered and five times they forgot.

THE CONQUERED is a linear interactive Percy Jackson/Heroes of Olympus fan fiction game about the complexity and fluidity of Leo and Piper's relationship, a collection of interconnected short stories with a more realistic (and more mature) approach to the popular story prompt, "What if Piper and Leo remembered their memories in Wilderness School," and generally happening to remember that they have a history together. (Assuming that they did have something in the past.) The fanfic overlaps with many aspects and portrayals of Leo and Piper's relationship by the PJO fandom, from sibling-like and platonic to romantic and sexual.

VERSION 1.0 - RELEASED 12.7.2017

Features:

  • Approximately 12,000 words / seperated into five chapters
  •  Linear interactive text
  • a variety of soundtracks from different artists

Please report any technical difficulties to me
notyourleo@outlook.com or PM me on my tumblr notyourleo.space
